Claims

Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company

To process ADNIC claims, please follow the below steps:

  • Fill the form and send it by email to the following email addresses: n.mattar@adnic.ae, k.kannan@adnic.ae
Download Claim Form

RSA

To process RSA claims, please follow the below steps:

  • Send an email to commercialclaims@ae.rsagroup.com along with copies of shipping documents Bill of Lading, Invoice , Packing List and Customs Bill and photographs if available.
  • RSA Claims Team will contact you to advise the next steps. Contact Numbers : 04 3029 903 / 04 3029 906

Noor Takaful

To process Noor Takaful claims, please follow the below steps:

  • Fill the form and send it by email to the following email addresses: n.mattar@adnic.ae, k.kannan@adnic.ae
Download Claim Form
